opis: Posredujemo u prodaji velike dvokatnice smještene u vrlo mirnom okruženju, na predjelu Barutana. Kuća je etažirana, nova fasada i zatvori… Sastoji se od podruma, prizemlja, prvog i drugog kata. Prizemlje ima 32,52m2 te mu pripada ostava od 3,95m2 što zajedno čini 36,47m2. Sastoji se od jedne spavaće sobe, hodnika, kupatila i kuhinje sa blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom. Prvi kat ima 74,43m2 + veliki balkon od 12,23m2 te mu pripada velika ostava u podrumu od 13,55m2 što zajedno čini 100,21m2. Radi se o velikom trosobnom stanu sa kupatilom, kuhinjom, blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom. Drugi kat ima 74,43m2 + balkon od 12,23m2 te mu pripada ostava u podrumu od 7,60m2 što zajedno čini 94,26m2. Također se radi o trosobnom stanu sa kupatilom, kuhinjom, blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom. Kuća ima i garažu od 16,74m2 + 2 otvorena parkirna mjesta od 19,11m2. Kuća je u izvrsnom stanju, vrlo kvalitetno napravljena te je idealna za obitelj ali jednako tako, postoji mogućnost i iznajmljivanja. Kompletno je etažirana te svaki stan može biti cjelina za sebe. Kuća se prodaje kao cijelina sa svime za cijenu od 550.000€. Blizina svih sadržaja, City centar Split je idaljen svega par minuta… Sve dodatne info kao i dogovor za termin obilaska nekretnine na KONTAKT: 0915616295 (ANDREA) We are mediating the sale of a large two-floors house located in a very quiet area, in the Barutana area. The house is multi-storey, new facade and doors... It consists of basement, ground floor, first and second floor. The ground floor has 32.52 m2 and it has a storage room of 3.95 m2, which together makes 36.47 m2. It consists of one bedroom, hallway, bathroom and kitchen with dining room and living room. The first floor has 74.43 m2 + a large balcony of 12.23 m2 and a large storage room in the basement of 13.55 m2 belongs to it, which together makes 100.21 m2. It is a large three-room apartment with a bathroom, kitchen, dining room and living room. The second floor has 74.43 m2 + a balcony of 12.23 m2 and a storage room in the basement of 7.60 m2 belongs to it, which together makes 94.26 m2. It is also a three-room apartment with a bathroom, kitchen, dining room and living room. The house also has a garage of 16.74m2 + 2 open parking spaces of 19.11m2. The house is in excellent condition, very well made, and is ideal for a family, but there is also the possibility of renting it out. It is completely split level, and each apartment can be a whole by itself. The house is sold as a whole with everything for the price of €550,000. Close to all facilities, the city center of Split is only a few minutes away... All additional information as well as an appointment for a tour of the property at CONTACT: 0915616295 (ANDREA)
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
